attributes.action: Provide ongoing antibiotic treatment on the nhs for Lymes Disease sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lymes disease sufferers desperately need ongoing antibiotic treatment to be provided by the nhs as private treatment is beyond the financial means of the ordinary person.their suffering and pain affects the extended family also who have to watch their inevitable decline.the number of sufferers is increasing rapidly every year and they should not be abandoned by the nhs
